Literature.Title: Native thrombocidin-1 and unfolded thrombocidin-1 exert antimicrobial activity via distinct structural elements.
Literature.Author: Kwakman PH, Krijgsveld J, de Boer L, Nguyen LT, Boszhard L, Vreede J, Dekker HL, Speijer D, Drijfhout JW, te Velde AA, Crielaard W, Vogel HJ, Vandenbroucke-Grauls CM, Zaat SA
